title: “I Was A Stranger and You Welcomed Me”
itunes:title: “I Was A Stranger and You Welcomed Me”
description:
Malcolm tells the story of how his parents and their friends sponsored three Vietnamese refugees, in the aftermath of the Vietnam War. And wonders: do we underestimate the value of ordinary acts of kindness?

If you’d like to keep up with the most recent news from this and other Pushkin podcasts, be sure to sign up for our email list at Pushkin.fm. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
